name: Lumino Station
description:
Title: Lumino Station
Platform: WebGL
Genre: Puzzle
Rating: E (ESRB)
Target Market: Casual (Puzzle) 13-18

Redirect Lasers off mirrors to reach the Goal.

Controls: Left click to select object. Move mouse to rotate selected object. Right click to deselect object. Selectable objects must be touching a laser, and will have a halo when mouse is hovering over it.
